attributes.action: Withdraw form NCC1- "Support for a child conceived without your consent"
attributes.additional_details:
If you are entitled to claim for a 3rd child "conceived without your consent" then this form helpfully lists what is meant by non-consensual conception, controlling and coercive behaviour and what is meant by an intimate family relationship Usefully you don't need to have been to court but you do need a professional to corroborate. 
There is no place for this form that has entered our system without proper parliamentary debate.
attributes.background:
This form does not protect children from poverty, does not protect vulnerable adults, and will not protect professionals who are called upon to sign it.
The two-child limit for tax credit had been voted on by parliament, but the 'rape clause' was not as it was appended to another law.
